qMetaDef.title: Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)
qMetaDef.description: The Total Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) KPI measures the total cost incurred to produce and sell the company's products. It is calculated by multiplying the unit cost of a product by the quantity sold, and then summing up these values for all products sold. This KPI is useful for determining the profitability of the company's product lines and for identifying areas where costs can be reduced.
